import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaArrowRight, FaStar, FaTruck, FaShieldAlt, FaCreditCard, FaHeart, FaShoppingBag, FaUser, FaSearch, FaInstagram, FaTwitter, FaFacebook, FaCheck, FaClock, FaAward, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaEye, FaTag, FaStore } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../styles/ShadowhoodBanner.css'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "LENTILLES DE CONTACT", description: "Approvisionnement exclusif auprès des Laboratoires officiels" }, { icon: , title: "TIERS PAYANT à partir de 0€", description: "Régime Obligatoire & Mutuelles" }, { icon: , title: "Entreprise Familiale depuis 1991", description: "Boutique de mode depuis 2024" }, { icon: , title: "LUNETTES et SOLAIRES CORRECTRICES", description: "Verres de qualité premium" }, { icon: , title: "+ DE 15 000 REFERENCES", description: "+ de 100 marques en stock" } ]; const categories = [ { name: "FEMME", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=femme", description: "Collection femme" }, { name: "HOMME", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=homme", description: "Collection homme" }, { name: "ENFANT", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=enfant", description: "Collection enfant" }, { name: "UNISEXE", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551028719-00167b16eac5?w=600", link: "/products?categorie=unisexe", description: "Collection unisexe" } ]; const trendingProducts = [ { name: "T-shirt Premium", price: "29.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1521572163474-6864f9cf17ab?w=400", badge: "Nouveau" }, { name: "Jean Slim Fit", price: "79.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542272604-787c3835535d?w=400", badge: "Populaire" }, { name: "Robe d'Été", price: "89.99€", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1515372039744-b8f02a3ae446?w=400", badge: "Promo" } ]; return (

); }; export default Home;
